As she and her companion walk back toward the base, Empath sees the 
tiger-bot and recognizes the mind that directs it.  "Maxima?" she 
calls.  "How in the blazes did you get here?"  The femme leaves 
Windlord's side and runs over to her fellow Decepticon.  Unlike 
Maxima, Empath looks much like her original Seeker self.  (I doubt 
Maxima would forget Skywarp's old girlfriend.)

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:

> Maxima glanced over her shoulder as she raced towards the 
destination. 
> Smirking at the lagging 'bot'.
> 
> With him lagging, she called out. "What's wrong, Human? Cannot keep 
up with a 
> REAL Transformer?" 
> 
> She laughed as she raced on ahead. Enjoying the speed. It was one 
of her 
> fancies anyway when she was a jet. She often liked to use it to 
push one of 
> Starscream's buttons. 
> 
> Soon enough, she was within the range of the base. Her optics 
beheld the 
> structure. 'So this is the pathetic place. Pathetic indeed.' Her 
mind 
> definitely came up with rebuilding her old form as well as setting 
off in 
> search of the Ark. She had to. Only Teletran 1 could rebuild her 
completely. 
> She doubted that anyone here would rebuild her the way SHE wanted 
to be. 
> 
> She noticed a wolf like bot awaiting & groaned as she slowed down & 
padded up 
> to him. "You must be the welcoming committee." her clear optics 
gazed at the 
> wolf.
